#include <bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;

long long int MOD = 1000000007; 
long long int dp[100400][350];
 
int main()
{
	for(int i=0; i<100400; i++) 
	for(int j = 0; j <= i && j < 350; ++j){
		if(i == j || j == 0) dp[i][j] = 1;
		else dp[i][j] = dp[i-1][j] + dp[i-1][j-1];
		if(dp[i][j] >= MOD) dp[i][j] -= MOD;
	}
 
	int t;cin>>t;
	while (t--){
		int n, k;
		cin>>n>>k;

		if(n==1){
			cout << -1 << endl;
			continue;
		}
		
		int r_k = 1;
		while (r_k * r_k <= k) r_k ++; 
		r_k--;

		long long int sum =0;
		sum = dp[n+r_k-1][r_k-1];
		long long int prev = r_k+1, nxt = r_k+1;
		for(int i = r_k; i>0;--i)	{
			prev = nxt;
			nxt = k/i + 1; 
			sum = sum + (nxt - prev) * 1L * dp [n+i-2][i-1] % MOD;
			if (sum >= MOD)sum-=MOD;
		}
 
		cout << sum << endl;
	}
 
	return 0;
}
